item.title: Sen. Kelly sues DOD Sec. Hegseth, says he was punished for 'disfavored political speech'
item.description: Hegseth said the Pentagon would cut Kelly's military retirement pay over his participation in a video telling U.S. troops they can refuse unlawful ord...

item.title: Powell investigation: Drumbeat of Republican opposition grows on Capitol Hill
item.description: Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell said he was under investigation on Sunday night, the latest episode in President Donald Trump's feud with him.

item.title: Fed Chair Powell says he's under criminal investigation, won't bow to Trump intimidation
item.description: President Donald Trump has criticized Federal Reserve chief Jerome Powell for not cutting interest rates as much and as quickly as the president wants...

item.title: Cuba's president says no current talks with the U.S. following Trump's threats
item.description: Cuban President Miguel Díaz-Canel said Monday that his administration is not in talks with the U.S. government.

item.title: Why most Greenlanders favor a future without Trump — or Denmark
item.description: "Greenland never has been for sale and never will be for sale," Aaja Chemnitz, one of two MPs in the Danish parliament representing Greenland, told CN...
